generated_text:
- road: The paved surface where the car is driving and where other vehicles and pedestrians are located.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side of the road where pedestrians and a cyclist are present, separated from the road by curbs and poles.
- building: The multi-story structure with windows visible on the left side of the image.
- pole: Vertical poles supporting traffic lights and signs throughout the scene.
- traffic light: The red traffic light signals visible at multiple intersections.
- traffic sign: The inverted triangle traffic sign indicating a yield or give-way point.
- vegetation: The large tree with green leaves in the center of the image and smaller trees and bushes along the sidewalk.
- terrain: The grassy area and patches of ground visible along the sidewalk and near the curb.
- sky: The overcast sky visible above the buildings and trees.
- person: Pedestrians walking on the sidewalk and a person on a bicycle.
- rider: The person riding a bicycle on the sidewalk.
- car: The black BMW car in the foreground and other cars visible in the background.
- bicycle: The bicycle being ridden by a person on the sidewalk.
